content:
StatusBarPanelAutoSize Enum

Definition

Specifies how a StatusBarPanel on a StatusBar control behaves when the control resizes.

In this Article

public enum StatusBarPanelAutoSize
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
StatusBarPanelAutoSize

Remarks

This enumeration is used by the AutoSize property. The AutoSize property specifies how a StatusBarPanel is autosized on a StatusBar control.

Fields

Contents

The width of the StatusBarPanel is determined by its contents.
None

The StatusBarPanel does not change size when the StatusBar control resizes.
Spring

The StatusBarPanel shares the available space on the StatusBar (the space not taken up by other panels whose stem.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize* property is set to None or Contents) with other panels that have their stem.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize* property set to Spring.
